snippet: GOLD--Stewart Benson. Park East Synagogue mourns the passing of Stewart Benson Gold, beloved father of our devoted members, Elisabeth (Trustee Scott) Domansky, dear grandfather of Olivia and David Domansky. May the family find comfort among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Rabbi Arthur Schneier Herman Hochberg, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: GOLD--Stewart Benson. Park East Synagogue mourns the passing of Stewart Benson Gold, beloved father of our devoted members, Elisabeth (Trustee Scott) Domansky, dear grandfather of Olivia and David Domansky. May the family find comfort among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Rabbi Arthur Schneier Herman Hochberg, President 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GOLD, STEWART BENSON
